overview:
## Overview

This enumeration defines the severity options used by the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAlertController/severity] property of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAlertController]. In apps built with Mac Catalyst, the severity determines the style of the presented alert. A [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAlertControllerSeverity/critical] alert appears with a caution icon, and an alert with a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAlertControllerSeverity/default] severity doesn’t. UIKit ignores the alert severity on iOS.

You should only use the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAlertControllerSeverity/critical] severity if an alert truly requires special attention from the user. For more information, see the [https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/macos/windows-and-views/alerts/] on alerts.

# UIAlertControllerSeverity

**Enumeration**

Constants for specifying the severity of an alert in apps built with Mac Catalyst.

## Declaration

```swift
enum UIAlertControllerSeverity
```

## Overview

This enumeration defines the severity options used by the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAlertController/severity] property of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAlertController]. In apps built with Mac Catalyst, the severity determines the style of the presented alert. A [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAlertControllerSeverity/critical] alert appears with a caution icon, and an alert with a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAlertControllerSeverity/default] severity doesn’t. UIKit ignores the alert severity on iOS.

You should only use the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIAlertControllerSeverity/critical] severity if an alert truly requires special attention from the user. For more information, see the [https://developer.apple.com/design/human-interface-guidelines/macos/windows-and-views/alerts/] on alerts.

## Constants

- **UIAlertControllerSeverity.critical**: Indicates that the system should present the alert using the critical, or caution, style.
- **UIAlertControllerSeverity.default**: Indicates that the system should present the alert using the standard alert style.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Configuring alert severity

- **severity**: Indicates the severity of the alert.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
